contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[islet]]s of [[Cyprus]]'''. *Agios Georgios Island located in Polis Bay. *Yeronisos Island<ref>http://www.yeronisos.org/Yeronisos_Field_Expedition/Yeronisos_Island_Excavations_and_Field_School,_Cyprus.html</ref> *Glykiotissa islet *Mesa Galounia islet *Hamili, located in the bay Polis. *Klides islets located at Cape Apostolos Andreas. It is the easternmost part of Cyprus. *Koppos, islet located in the southwest of Cyprus to the Akamas peninsula. Lies close to the Kionos. *Kionos, islet located in the southwest of Cyprus to the Akamas peninsula. Located close to Koppos *Kordylia, located east of the island near the Cape of Apostolos Andreas. *Mazaki, a small islet located off the Akamas peninsula. *Kanoudia islet located in the southwest of Cyprus to the Akamas peninsula. == References == <references /> {{Asia topic|List of islands of}} {{Europe topic|List of islands of}} [[Category:Lists of landforms of Cyprus|Islands]] [[Category:Islands of Cyprus|*]] [[Category:Lists of islands by country|Cyprus]]
